test.name: TC001_Landing_Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

arguments.arg: Language Studio Private and Secure Translation

kw.msg: Page title is 'Language Studio Private and Secure Translation'.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Questel Hybrid Deep NMT/SMT Trial'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.
kw.msg: ${Domainname1} = English to French (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid)

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.
kw.msg: ${Domainname2} = French to English (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid)

kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: @{LANG[1]} = [ English to French (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid) ]

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: @{LANG[2]} = [ French to English (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid) ]

kw.name: Comment
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Comment
kw.doc: Displays the given messages in the log file as keyword arguments.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//*[@id="selEngine"]' should have contained text 'English to French (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid)' but its text was 'French to English (Questel Patents Classbase-DNMT Hybrid)'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test Verify Landing Page and Main Page Objects verifications.
